description: This file defines the NotesListScreen widget for the Flutter app, showing a list of notes, handling navigation to note editing/creation screens, and rendering appropriate UI components.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of notes with options to add or edit notes.

classes.name: _Id
classes.description: A utility class providing a UUID generation method for internal use.

methods.name: _createNote
methods.description: Navigates to the NoteEditorScreen to create a new note.

methods.name: _editNote
methods.description: Navigates to the NoteEditorScreen to edit an existing note identified by note.id.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the notes list screen, displaying either an empty state or a list of notes.

methods.name: v4
methods.description: Generates a new UUID v4 string for internal note ID assignment.
